:mod:`canPDOMonitor.manager`
============================

.. py:module:: canPDOMonitor.manager

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Created on Thu Sep 24 12:52:32 2020

   @author: Research



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   canPDOMonitor.manager.Manager



.. py:class:: Manager

   Main class for managing PDO conversion, logging, gui etc

   contains a PDO converter object to bring in datapoints from can bus
   routes these to any logger or graphics that are active
